messages.message:
Do we have any mechanism today in ib that is similar to a Kafka event bus that one can tap into? ie.. when a user logs in. When a flow is executed. When a flow is executed with x pipeline. When a model is trained. 

Can jaeger be used in this regards?
I believe the Audit Logs app is supposed to achieve a goal similar to this, but I am not sure if we are still actively developing on it. It may be missing some operations too.
